fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Seduce a player during the night.
-Detach yourself from the world during the night, becoming visit immune (1-shot)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Seduced players will be roleblocked, and if they attempt to vote for you the next day, their vote will secretly have 0 weight.
-While you are detached, visitors will be given the generic failed visit message. Astral actions can still target you.
-If you take no action during the night, you have detection immunity, appearing as a different random Town role each night. You will know what Town role you appear as each night.
